meanings.definition: Not picturesque; lacking in beauty or charm.
meanings.sent1: The small, unpicturesque town had plain buildings and no colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The artist chose to paint the picturesque landscape instead of the unpicturesque one.
meanings.sent3: The unpicturesque view from the window made the artist chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her unpicturesque outfit was like a dull canvas waiting for a splash of color.
meanings.sent5: The unpicturesque scene was etched in his memory, never to be forgotten.

meanings.definition: Not suitable for being depicted in a picture; not visually appealing.
meanings.sent1: The unpicturesque alley was dark and uninviting.
meanings.sent2: The picturesque garden was a stark contrast to the unpicturesque industrial area.
meanings.sent3: She tried to make the unpicturesque room look better with some colorful decorations.
meanings.sent4: The unpicturesque cityscape seemed like a forgotten painting left in the attic.
meanings.sent5: The unpicturesque scene outside the window seemed to drain all color from the world.
